document.full_text: kyrie irving, out since dec. 4 with an injured toe, scored a game-high 14 points as the top-seeded blue devils cruised in their opening tournament game.
document.title: west: duke 87, hampton 45: duke rolls, giving irving plenty of playing time
lines_and_colors: kyrie irving, out since dec. 4 with an injured toe, scored a game-high 14 points as the top-seeded blue devils cruised in their opening tournament game.
